message: Any plugins out there for Nexus beyond Memcache/Gargoyle? :)
(We're FINALLY using it internally, after releasing it months ago :/)
i had made one to check Gearman status for a project, but didn't finish the project
I started a real user admin system (that actually understand profile models and such) but also never finished it
i created a couple that just added widgets to the dashboard and a couple extra in-nexus pages
I'm glad that we're finally using it because I quickly found some obvious behavioral bugs. Hopefully in the next few weeks we'll have a much better platform for building administrative apps on top of
@zeeg Yeah, would love to start trying out Nexus in one of my projects =). The lack of docs is making it a bit tough though =(.
